content: cedar scarf is a free scarf knitting pattern for worsted weight yarn featuring subtle tree motifs created with knit and purl stitches worked flat in two sections and joined seamlessly at the center this scarf has a calm wearable texture suitable for everyday use by men or women **skills ** knit purl vdd stitch kitchener stitch **features ** rectangular shape textured motif knit flat seamless center join **materials ** worsted weight yarn size 7 needles tapestry needle
